content:
Here is a table of Jack Nicklaus' major championship wins, sorted by year and including the venues where they were held:

| Year | Major Championship | Venue |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 1962 | U.S. Open | Oakmont Country Club |
| 1963 | Masters | Augusta National Golf Club |
| 1963 | PGA Championship | Dallas Athletic Club |
| 1965 | Masters | Augusta National Golf Club |
| 1966 | Masters | Augusta National Golf Club |
| 1966 | British Open | Muirfield |
| 1968 | U.S. Open | Pebble Beach Golf Links |
| 1970 | British Open | St. Andrews |
| 1972 | Masters | Augusta National Golf Club |
| 1972 | British Open | Muirfield |
| 1974 | U.S. Open | Winged Foot Golf Club |
| 1975 | Masters | Augusta National Golf Club |
| 1977 | PGA Championship | Southern Hills Country Club |
| 1980 | Masters | Augusta National Golf Club |
| 1980 | PGA Championship | Firestone Country Club |
| 1980 | PGA Championship | Baltusrol Golf Club |
| 1980 | U.S. Open | Baltusrol Golf Club |
| 1986 | Masters | Augusta National Golf Club |
| 1988 | PGA Championship | Inverness Club |
